content:
Over the past day, March 30, Russian troops fired at the territory of 14 regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

In total, 128 settlements and 147 infrastructure sites were attacked from different types of weapons - mortars, artillery, tanks, UAVs, UDCs, Tactical Aviation.

As a result of hostile shelling, they are dead and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

As reportedArmyinform, the enemy attacked the winged rockets of Lviv region: there are victims.
title: During the day the enemy attacked 128 settlements of Ukraine
description: About it reports Military Media Center. In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, ...
author: Army Inform
